name: Galagan's Island ~ Reprymian Rising For Itch.io
name_original: Galagan's Island ~ Reprymian Rising For Itch.io
description:
Galagan's Island is our Arcade-Retro Styled Bullet Hell Space Shooter, paying loving homage to classic arcade style and difficulty.

Featuring 25 LEVELS of handcrafted whimsical charm, so pretty you almost don't want to destroy them.

Galagan's Island utilizes slow motion bullet dodging to assist in your survival. The game also features a damage & repair system...as you take on damage you not only lose your life expectancy, but your ship starts to perform poorly. Every 5 levels, after defeating a boss, you will have to choose to improve your ship's speed, gun speed, or overall life bar. Choose wisely!

Original Soundtrack featuring smooth jazz and hip-hop styles, personalized trip-hop TRACKS, 8 bit chip-tunes & 4th wall frenzies....not to mention a slew of rising Indie musicians ...brought to you courtesy of Forever Humble PDX.

Optimized For Both Gamepad and Keyboard Controls.

This version of Galagan's Island is exclusive to itch.io

It contains 25 levels, 5 bosses and 1 mini game. Updates will be made, but new content will not be added. If you would like to experience the game as we continue to develop and grow it, please purchase the game in Early Access on Steam. http://store.steampowered.com/app/378850
